page.title: 02CLUBS AND RECREATION
page.content:
{CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS THE POPULATION OF PORTISHEAD AND DISTRICT IS NOW ABOUT 14,000 AND INCREASING. THERE ARE OVER 90 ORGANISATIONS AND CLUBS IN THE TOWN.FACILITIES FOR SPORT AND RECREATIONS ARE GOOD WITH PLENTY OF OPEN SPACES AND PUBLIC AMENITIES ALONG THE SEA FRONT.THERE ARE PUBLIC HALLS SUITABLE FOR ALL TYPES OF ENTERTAINMENT.
{BMX THERE ARE A NUMBER OF BMX CLUBS AND BMX ASSOCIATIONS ONE OF THEM IS CALLED WHELLERS BMX CLUB.THE MEETINGSARE ON SATURDAY AT 10:00 A.M. UNTIL 12:30 P.M.AT THE YOUTH CLUB IN HARBOUR ROAD NEAR PORTISHEAD DOCKS. ALL KINDS OF TRICKS AND STUNTS INCLUDING
